Actions.Text: ----------------------------------------------------------------# Auth: Christopher Stone# dCre: 2018/03/24 15:08# dMod: 2018/03/24 15:08 # Appl: Finder# Task: Open the Keyboard Maestro Logs Folder in the Background.# Libs: None# Osax: None# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @Finder, @Open, @Keyboard_Maestro, @Logs, @Folder, @Background----------------------------------------------------------------set folderAlias to alias ((path to library folder from user domain as text) & "Logs:Keyboard Maestro:")tell application "Finder"	open folderAliasend tell----------------------------------------------------------------

Actions.ActionName: CHECK FOR LONG PRESS of Trigger to Set Option/Choice for Macro

ElseActions.Text: ----------------------------------------------------------------# Auth: Christopher Stone# dCre: 2018/03/24 15:20# dMod: 2018/03/24 15:20 # Appl: BBEdit# Task: Scroll the insertion point to the end of the text.# Libs: None# Osax: None# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @BBEdit, @Scroll, @Insertion, @Point, @End, @Text----------------------------------------------------------------tell application "BBEdit"	tell  text document "Engine.log"		select insertion point after its text	end tellend tell----------------------------------------------------------------
